Database Schema

  • Database schema(ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ):
    • ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ì˜ ë…¼ë¦¬ì  êµ¬ì¡°, relation schemasì˜ ì§‘í•©
  • Database instance(ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤):
    • ì£¼ì–´ì§„ íŠ¹ì • ì‹œì ì˜ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ data snapshot
  • ì˜ˆ: University database
  • Database schema:
    • instructor(ID, name, dept_name, salary)
    • department(dept_name, building, budget)
    • course(course_id, title, dept_name, credits)
    • section(course_id, sec_id, semester, year, building, room_number, time_slot_id)
    • prereq(course_id, prereq_id)
    • teaches(ID, course_id, sec_id, semester, year)
    • student(ID, name, dept_name, tot_cred)
    • adviser(s_id, i_id)
    • takes(ID, course_id, sec_id, semester, year, grade)
    • classroom(building, room_number, capacity)
    • time_slot(time_slot_id, day, start_time, end_time)

Relational Query Languages

  • Procedural(ì ˆì°¨ì ) vs non-procedural(ë¹„ì ˆì°¨ì ) or declarative(ì„ ì–¸ì )
  • "Pure" languages:
    • Relational algebra(ê´€ê³„ ëŒ€ìˆ˜) (procedural)
    • Tuple relational calculus(íŠœí”Œ ê´€ê³„ í•´ì„) (non-procedural)
    • Domain relational calculus(ë„ë©”ì¸ ê´€ê³„ í•´ì„) (non-procedural)
  • ìœ„ 3ê°œì˜ pure languagesëŠ” ê³„ì‚° ëŠ¥ë ¥ ë©´ì—ì„œ ë™ë“±
  • ì´ ì¥ì—ì„œëŠ” relational algebraì— ì§‘ì¤‘í•  ê²ƒì„
  • Turing-machine equivalentê°€ ì•„ë‹˜
  • 6ê°œì˜ ê¸°ë³¸ ì—°ì‚°ìœ¼ë¡œ êµ¬ì„±

Natural-Join Operation

  • í‘œê¸°ë²•: râ‹ˆsr \bowtie srâ‹ˆs
  • rrrê³¼ sssë¥¼ ê°ê° schema RRRê³¼ SSS ìœ„ì˜ relationì´ë¼ ê°€ì •. ê²°ê³¼ëŠ” schema RâˆªSR \cup SRâˆªS ìœ„ì˜ relationì´ë©°, rrrì˜ ê° tuple trt_rtrâ€‹ê³¼ sssì˜ ê° tuple tst_stsâ€‹ë¥¼ ê³ ë ¤í•˜ì—¬ ì–»ì–´ì§
  • ë§Œì•½ trt_rtrâ€‹ê³¼ tst_stsâ€‹ê°€ Râˆ©SR \cap SRâˆ©Sì˜ ê° attributeì—ì„œ ë™ì¼í•œ ê°’ì„ ê°€ì§€ë©´, ê²°ê³¼ì— tuple tttê°€ ì¶”ê°€ë¨, ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ

  • ì˜ˆ:

    • râ‹ˆsr \bowtie srâ‹ˆsëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì´ ì •ì˜ë¨:

Natural Join Operation â€“ Example

Natural Joinì˜ ì†ì„±

  • Î A1,...,Ak(r)âˆ©Î A1,...,Ak(s)=Î A1,...,Ak(râ‹ˆs)\Pi_{A_1, ..., A_k}(r) \cap \Pi_{A_1, ..., A_k}(s) = \Pi_{A_1, ..., A_k}(r \bowtie s)Î A1â€‹,...,Akâ€‹â€‹(r)âˆ©Î A1â€‹,...,Akâ€‹â€‹(s)=Î A1â€‹,...,Akâ€‹â€‹(râ‹ˆs)
    • (A1,...,AkA_1, ..., A_kA1â€‹,...,Akâ€‹: ê³µí†µ attributes)

  • ë§Œì•½ Râˆ©S=âˆ…R \cap S = \emptysetRâˆ©S=âˆ… ì´ë©´ râ‹ˆs=rÃ—sr \bowtie s = r \times srâ‹ˆs=rÃ—s (ì¤‘ìš”! râ‹ˆsâ‰ âˆ…r \bowtie s \neq \emptysetrâ‹ˆsî€ =âˆ…)
